text:
Rockstar San Diego | Junior Engine Programmer | Carlsbad, CA | Onsite, full-time

https://www.rockstargames.com/careers/openings/position/ec26...

Rockstar San Diego is looking for talented junior software engineers to join our international Rockstar engine team. We are looking for the smartest natural coders out there that we can help grow into skilled engineers, so you can help us develop bleeding edge architectures, evolve and expand our engine, and build tools and systems that make it fast, flexible and easy to use. Rockstar is a tight-knit community and highly collaborative, so you will need to be able to communicate easily and effectively with fellow coders, designers and artists.
